definition: an awkward person/a difficult person to deal with
thorn/sting/thrust/to prick/to pierce/to stab/to assassinate/to murder
head/hair style/the top/end/beginning or end/a stub/remnant/chief/boss/side/aspect/first/leading/classifier for pigs or livestock/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: His irreverence for authority marks him out as a troublemaker.
sentences.chinese: 他對權威的不敬使他成了一個惹是生非的刺兒頭。

sentences.english: Eg:He is known to be a troublesome person in his unit. Nobody likes to deal with him.
sentences.chinese: 他是單位有名的刺兒頭，沒有人願意與他打交道。
